item.description: Mystic Sound is offering an evening of soothing sound and vibrational healing by candlelight. Mystic Sound is a trio with Clarence Dow on cello, Dave Estes on didgeridoo and Judy on crystal singing bowls and harpsickle. There will be other sound surprises! Besides the sound bath, this evening includes Oneness Blessing, Crown and third eye attunement with Ohm tuning forks, and time for you to informally interact with the instruments. Play Judy's bowls and receive a close-up personal chakra healing with the Didgeridoo. (also snacks! Class is limited to 25 and pre-registration is requested: 781-639-1236 or judy@ahigherbalance.com. Program runs 7:30 - 9:00 pm.  See all programs at http://www.ahigherbalance.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block; center is directly above Starbucks in downtown Salem MA.
item.name: Sound Healing by Candlelight
